If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Since its conception in 2009, Australian label findersKEEPERS has satisfied the niche for fun, edgy, and affordable fashion. The label has seen a swift rise in popularity, emerging onto the fashion scene in the USA and UK in 2011. With handcrafted embroidery, exclusive prints, and trademark party dresses, findersKEEPERS clothing shows true confidence in youth--at any age.
